examples: they started at the bottom of the hill

definitions.text: the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
examples: he deserves a good kick in the butt
are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?

definitions.text: the second half of an inning; while the home team is at bat
a depression forming the ground under a body of water
examples: he searched for treasure on the ocean bed

definitions.text: low-lying alluvial land near a river

examples: they did much of their overseas trade in foreign bottoms

definitions.text: provide with a bottom or a seat
strike the ground, as with a ship's bottom
situated at the bottom or lowest position
